title: Ticket #3077: New tests: detect leaked spool directory files
description:
We could use one or more tests to detect if files and directories in SPOOL are leaked when a job leaves the queue.

  • Specifically test the case of submitting a job with ON_EXIT_OR_EVICT that has been evicted at least once. This will catch regressions of fix #2942.
  • Perhaps for jobs that are using shared code should automatically check to ensure that they didn't leave anything in SPOOL?
